short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the converted currency in a popup bubble when highlighting numbers on a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight, simple, and handy extension to convert instantly from one currency to another by simply highlighting numbers on any web page. You can also customise the look of the popup bubble to suit your tastes.

No longer will you have to tediously switch between tabs or windows to calculate the cost of an item when online shopping, do the conversion right on the same page! 

If you encounter any bugs or there are some features you would like to see implemented, please feel free to contact me!

Please leave a review if you use the extension!

* New in v1.1 update - Save your frequently used currency pairs to change to them at a click of a button!

* New in v1.2 update - Changed API since previous one was no longer free.
